title: Science Education Field Application Project for Novice School Leaders

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: A field-intensive project-based environment to strengthen science curriculum leadership

learning_goals: Can analyze science education problems occurring in educational settings and design field-based solutions
Can collaborate with peer leaders to develop one or more applicable science education projects
Can visually present project execution results using digital tools and incorporate feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
